extends Object

      • createHandlerServer

        public final io.netty.handler.ssl.SslHandler createHandlerServer(boolean needClientAuth,

        pipeline.addLast("ssl", sslhandler);
        Parameters:
        needClientAuth - True if the client needs to be authenticated (only if serverMode is True)

        Returns:
        the sslhandler
